title: On The Superiority of Dwarvs
content:
In this entry into the Grand Compendium of Dwarven Superiority Vol III, I will explain and support through scientific methods why exactly the Dwarv Organism is naturally superior to all offshoots of Dwarg type creatures.

First, we shall start with the names...

title: The Song That Calls the Rot
content: The mountain sang, and from the rot there came creatures of strange design...

title: From Earth To Root - A Rough Guide To Descending
content: Descending is not merely digging. One must listen to the stones...

title: The Stones of Our Mountain
content: Each stone has a name, and the mountain remembers...

title: Echoes of the Thrallborne
content: When the Thrallborne marched, they left behind only whispers...

title: The Last Mumbles of a Witless Dorf
content: Before he fell into the chasm, the witless Dorf was heard to mutter these words...
